data.title: Nilgiri's Badi Chowdi Cladding
meta_keywords: Nilgiri's Badi Chowdi Cladding service provider
data.meta_description: Pooja Sri Aluminium - Offering Nilgiri's Badi Chowdi Cladding, ACP Cladding at Rs 250/sq ft in Hyderabad, Telangana. Get contact number of verified dealers of Completed Projects | ID: 4557570930
data.text:
Poojasree Aluminium Arch Fabrication is promoted by "Mr. Narsapuram Srinivas Chary" (proprietor) and we are in the field of aluminum, established in the year1997. Our organization is known as aluminum specialist. We have proudly established ourselves within our circle as one of the best aluminium cladding specialist that has grown tremendously over the past few years, proven through various high-profile projects entrusted to us. Capitalizing on over a ten years of project experiences, we have built a strong reputation amongst our clienteles as one of the finest and most reliable contractor in our class. Our success today has been greatly attributed by the stringent work policies that we have been adhering to all this years.

We are backed by a team of professionals and a high end warehousing unit that enables us to store our product range in a well organized and efficient manner. Due to their elegant designs, excellent patterns and smooth finish, our products and services have enabled us to carve a top notch position in the industry. Our professionals give their best possible efforts in providing our clients on-time deliveries of our products and services. These products and services are widely used in the service industry, institutions and commercial establishments like offices, business houses and multi-national companies. We are engaged in manufacturing and service providing in fabrication.

We Provide Fabrication service only in Telangana and A.P States.
